Signatures.Label: Max(number, number, ...)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns the largest value in a set of values. Ignores logical values and text.

Parameters.Label: number
Parameters.Documentation: A numeric value for this max operation.

Parameters.Label: number
Parameters.Documentation: A numeric value for this max operation.

Signatures.Label: Max(number, number, number, ...)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns the largest value in a set of values. Ignores logical values and text.

Parameters.Label: number
Parameters.Documentation: A numeric value for this max operation.

Parameters.Label: number
Parameters.Documentation: A numeric value for this max operation.

Parameters.Label: number
Parameters.Documentation: A numeric value for this max operation.

Signatures.Label: Max(source, expression)
Signatures.Documentation: Returns the largest value the expression evaluates to in the context of the table.

Parameters.Label: source
Parameters.Documentation: A table over which this max operation will be computed.

Parameters.Label: expression
Parameters.Documentation: An expression evaluated over each row in the input table, that provides numeric values for this max operation.
